channel.title: CVE Feed for Elcomplus -- SmartPTT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elcomplus -- SmartPTT

item.title: CVE-2021-43934|2024-08-04T04:10:17.090Z -- elcomplus -- smartptt
item.description: Elcomplus SmartPTT is vulnerable as the backup and restore system does not adequately validate upload requests, enabling a malicious user to potentially upload arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2021-43932|2024-08-04T04:10:16.306Z -- elcomplus -- smartptt
item.description: Elcomplus SmartPTT is vulnerable when an attacker injects JavaScript code into a specific parameter that can executed upon accessing the dashboard or the main page.

item.title: CVE-2021-43930|2024-08-04T04:10:16.986Z -- elcomplus -- smartptt
item.description: Elcomplus SmartPTT is vulnerable as the backup and restore system does not adequately validate download requests, enabling malicious users to perform path traversal attacks and potentially download arbitrary files from the system.

item.title: CVE-2021-43939|2024-08-04T04:10:17.163Z -- elcomplus -- smartptt
item.description: Elcomplus SmartPTT is vulnerable when a low-authenticated user can access higher level administration authorization by issuing requests directly to the desired endpoints.
